nl.weeaboo.vn.scene

Interface IColorizable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IButton, IDrawable, IGridPanel, IImageDrawable, IPanel, ITextDrawable, ITransformable

    public interface IColorizable
    Interface for objects which can be tinted with a color.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAlpha()
      Returns the alpha component of the current color in the range [0.0, 1.0]
      double getBlue()
      Returns the blue component of the current color in the range [0.0, 1.0]
      int getColorARGB() 
      int getColorRGB() 
      double getGreen()
      Returns the green component of the current color in the range [0.0, 1.0]
      double getRed()
      Returns the red component of the current color in the range [0.0, 1.0]
      void setAlpha(double a)
      Sets the alpha component of the current color.
      void setColor(double r, double g, double b)
      Sets the RGB components of the current color, where each component is in the range [0.0, 1.0].
      void setColor(double r, double g, double b, double a)
      Sets the the current color and alpha, where each component is in the range [0.0, 1.0].
      void setColorARGB(int argb)
      Sets the current color and alpha.
      void setColorRGB(int rgb)
      Sets the RGB components of the current color.

    • Method Detail

      • getColorARGB

        int getColorARGB()
        Returns:
        The current color (red, green, blue) and alpha, packed together into a single int in ARGB order.

      • getColorRGB

        int getColorRGB()
        Returns:
        The current color (red, green, blue), packed into an int in RGB order. The value of the highest 8 bits is undefined.

      • getRed

        double getRed()
        Returns the red component of the current color in the range [0.0, 1.0]

      • getGreen

        double getGreen()
        Returns the green component of the current color in the range [0.0, 1.0]

      • getBlue

        double getBlue()
        Returns the blue component of the current color in the range [0.0, 1.0]

      • getAlpha

        double getAlpha()
        Returns the alpha component of the current color in the range [0.0, 1.0]

      • setAlpha

        void setAlpha(double a)
        Sets the alpha component of the current color.
        Parameters:
        a - The new alpha value in the range [0.0, 1.0].

      • setColorRGB

        void setColorRGB(int rgb)
        Sets the RGB components of the current color.
        Parameters:
        rgb - RGB color packed into an XXRRGGBB integer.

      • setColorARGB

        void setColorARGB(int argb)
        Sets the current color and alpha.
        Parameters:
        argb - ARGB color+alpha packed into an AARRGGBB integer.

      • setColor

        void setColor(double r,
              double g,
              double b)
        Sets the RGB components of the current color, where each component is in the range [0.0, 1.0].

      • setColor

        void setColor(double r,
              double g,
              double b,
              double a)
        Sets the the current color and alpha, where each component is in the range [0.0, 1.0].
